statement.p: A fractal is constructed with a a horizontal line _______ as the intiator and the following generator:
To help you interpret this drawing, note that _ has width 1, /\ has width 1, \_/ has width 2, and | has width 0.
Determine the fractal dimension of the curve generated by this set up.

answer.p: Scaling the fractal by a factor of {{scale}} requires {{pieces}} copies of the orginal. The fractal dimension is \frac{\ln({{pieces}})}{\ln({{scale}})} \approx {{dimension}}
